title: Princess Beatrice's engagement ring: an all-diamond modern classic designed by her fiancé with British jeweller Shaun Leane
text:
What could brighten up a dismal week more than news of another royal wedding? Princess Beatrice this morning announced her engagement to boyfriend of 10 months Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi, with her sister, Eugenie, sharing a series of photos of the happy couple on her Instagram account.

Helpfully, the images included a close-up shot of the all-important ring: a platinum design with a large central brilliant-cut diamond and tapered diamond shoulders. Close-up images of the ring reveal that it is set with pave-diamonds all around the band.

The ring was designed by the groom-to-be in collaboration with Shaun Leane, the British jeweller who had a long-time partnership with fashion designer Alexander McQueen....
